scriptures.verse: For this is the whole duty of man, that we fear Yah and keep his commandments and his commandments are not grievous.
scriptures.action: Read Exodus 20 and find at least two commandments you can do better with

scriptures.verse: Sin is the transgression of the law
scriptures.action: Read a chapter from the book of Deuteronomy and try to find a law you are not currently aware of.

scriptures.verse: For this is the love of Yah, that we keep his commandments
scriptures.action: How can we show Yah that we love him more today?
